title: Civil Society in Russia and UK

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best compares government regulation of civil society in Russia with that of the United Kingdom?

choices.label: Only in Russia must civil society groups register with the government.
Only in Russia does the government provide all funding for civil society groups.
The Russian government monitors civil society groups much more closely than does the government of the United Kingdom.
In both Russia and the United Kingdom the government frequently jails members of opposition civil society groups.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Compare two or more course countries based on their political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
